text:
SuperAwesome | Full Stack Engineer | Full-time Onsite | London

//MISSION & WHAT WE DO Join us to develop the digital platform that powers a better internet for kids! We work with big brands like LEGO, Hasbro, Mattel (and many others...) and provide them with kids-safe technology they can use in their awesome games/apps/websites.

//TECH STACK The tech stack is mainly Node/Angular/Redux/Docker/Kubernetes/Kafka/Druid.io/Cassandra/Postgres/Redis[...I can continue :)] on top of AWS (we have some Golang/Java/Python as well!)

//SCALE Our platform is already making the internet safer for half a Billion kids every month.

//READY? Apply here https://superawesome.workable.com/j/D38D7B45F6

More info on our hiring process here https://bit.ly/hiring-kid-safe-engineers
